meanings.definition: A term of respect used to address someone of higher rank or status.
meanings.sent1: The students greeted the principal with great huzoor during the school assembly.
meanings.sent2: She spoke to the queen with utmost huzoor at the royal event.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed with huzoor as if demanding royal treatment.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood tall in the forest, commanding huzoor from all other plants.
meanings.sent5: The wise owl was regarded with huzoor by all the animals in the forest.

meanings.definition: A term used to refer to a person's presence or attendance.
meanings.sent1: His huzoor at the meeting was noted by everyone present.
meanings.sent2: The huzoor of the guest added a special touch to the event.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to mimic the huzoor of the wise old owl.
meanings.sent4: The sun's huzoor in the sky marked the beginning of a new day.
meanings.sent5: The painting lacked life until the artist added the huzoor of a colorful bird.
